mapper.update: update oa_role set ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ROLE_IDENTIFI = #{roleIdentifi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, ORG_ID, ROLE_IDENTIFI, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME from oa_role
